eu.wauz.wauzstarter

Class SeasonalSurvivalManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzstarter.SeasonalSurvivalManager

  • public class SeasonalSurvivalManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create a new world when a Survival season starts. It should be used once a day on server startup.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    SeasonalSurvivalUtils

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static WauzStarter core
      A direct reference to the main class.

      If a spawn circle should be created automatically.
      private java.lang.String currentSeason
      The current survival season.
      private java.io.File seasonFile
      The season file of the survival world.
      private org.bukkit.WorldCreator worldCreator
      The creator for the survival world.
      private java.lang.String worldName
      The name of the survival world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SeasonalSurvivalManager(org.bukkit.WorldCreator worldCreator, boolean createSpawn)
      Creates a seasonal survival manager for the given world.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generateSurvivalWorld()
      Loads the current Survival world or starts a new one, if it is outdated or has no Season.yml file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SeasonalSurvivalManager

        public SeasonalSurvivalManager(org.bukkit.WorldCreator worldCreator,
                               boolean createSpawn)
        Creates a seasonal survival manager for the given world.
        Parameters:
        worldCreator - The creator for the survival world.
        createSpawn - If a spawn circle should be created automatically.

    • Method Detail

      • generateSurvivalWorld

        public void generateSurvivalWorld()
        Loads the current Survival world or starts a new one, if it is outdated or has no Season.yml file.

      • updateSurvivalWorld

        private void updateSurvivalWorld()
        Tries to set up all properties of the current Survival world, if needed. This includes the spawn, season file and gamerules.

      • getSurvivalSeason

        private java.lang.String getSurvivalSeason()
        Returns:
        The current season. (YEAR-QUARTER)

      • getSurvivalSeasonFile

        private java.io.File getSurvivalSeasonFile()
        Returns:
        The path of the Season.yml in the Survival world folder.
